title: XP boost disapeared from the store

replies.body: They are back on EUW now

The [**Preseason Update FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908) talks about how XP boosts will still work in the new system, but since they're going to be worth so much more the price will be increasing. I'm guessing they were temporarily removed from the store while that change happens on the backend.

https://i.gyazo.com/a161336a83abe67b026a61629d35f548.png

I saw the experience boosts available this morning and I now see they are gone. I was surprised to see this; as I planned to purchase one so that I would have it going into tomorrow. I didn't anticipate that they would increase the price of the boosts however, that would be unfortunate. I'm sure there is a reason for this and I've just missed it somehow.
50 win xp boost 980rp ============> 40 win xp boost 2440 rp :))
It wont be SO much of a change
Atleast they would have warned us. Very unprofessional from riot

I'm having the same thing on EUW, i was hella mad when i saw they weren't available anymore.
i hope they will birng them back asap
They will increase price of xp boost, so i guess they disabled them now :)))) typical riot.
When did they said it ? WTF
